function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implementation of travel restrictions and substantial control measures","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improved indoor air quality","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement targeted interventions for susceptible subgroups and age-specific control measures","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Respiratory etiquette","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced collaboration and coordination among eu member states and institutions","category":"Federated infrastructure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Balancing sustainable practices with indoor air quality standards, integrating natural ventilation systems, and promoting air purification technologies","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving infrastructure, providing access to healthcare, and implementing sanitation measures","category":"Managing drinking water safety measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing strict safety measures during data collection, offering remote survey options","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Establish cross-sector partnerships for knowledge sharing and collaboration","category":"Engagement in dramatic culture change, proactive communication with stakeholders","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promoting hand hygiene, regular disinfection of high-touch surfaces, and installing touchless facilities","category":"Personal hygiene (eg handwashing)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritizing funding for ipc initiatives, particularly for small businesses","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continued monitoring, testing, and updating of the ibem architecture","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tailoring interventions to target regions, investment in technology and infrastructure, subsidised mobile phone plans, free wi-fi hotspots, training programs, use of devices that do not require continuous network access.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integrating disease surveillance and vector control into conservation activities, promoting habitat restoration and management","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of risk management protocols and control measures for capturing harmful pathogens.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consider adapting compliance criteria to account for weekends and public holidays","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict social distancing protocols","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Standardized protocols for detection and quantification of wastewater samples","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improvement of healthcare capacity, implementation of control measures for social protection and economic package","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop and implement rapid and accurate diagnostic techniques for early detection of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase air change rates through controlled ventilation systems or opening windows","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Efficient crisis management, timely warning system","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improve specificity of pcr assays to distinguish between sars-cov-2 and other coronaviruses.","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adjustment for confounding factors, sensitivity analysis, peer review","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Physical distancing measures","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict quality control measures and testing at every stage of the production process","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging and enabling moderate physical exercise, especially for those with existing health conditions","category":"Improve physical health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"In-depth analysis and review of historical context, careful adaptation of technologies, and community engagement in decision-making","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide access to mental health resources, promote stress-reducing activities, and encourage social support.","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use accurate population distribution data for modeling and analysis","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide alternative survey methods, ensure diverse outreach, and address potential biases in analysis","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of online questionnaires to minimize physical contact and reduce the likelihood of disease transmission","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement clear guidelines for isolating individuals with respiratory tract infections, provide support for home isolation when necessary","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investment in public infrastructure, promotion of outdoor activities and communal spaces","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Invest in decentralized healthcare facilities and improved transportation infrastructure","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis visualization","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting environmental risk assessments for disease spread in different habitats","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of sustainable urban development, green infrastructure, and urban planning","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular disinfection of surfaces and materials","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Education, public health campaigns, and strict adherence to guidelines","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular maintenance schedule, monitoring and replacement of machine parts","category":"Control airflows in spaces & Avoid air recirculation","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Engagement in dramatic culture change, proactive communication with stakeholders","category":"Engagement in dramatic culture change, proactive communication with stakeholders","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Strict public health measures, access to quality healthcare, and development of effective treatments and vaccines.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Include questions that specifically address the impact of the pandemic on park use.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of combined public health measures such as personal hygiene, distancing, and barriers","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continued monitoring of air quality, public awareness campaigns, and implementation of sustainable air quality policies are essential to mitigate the impact of reduced pm 2.5 levels.","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop real-time reporting systems and improve data timeliness","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Federated infrastructure","category":"Federated infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing effective ventilation and air filtration systems to reduce the concentration of airborne
